text:
<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>


You are a voice assistant for Home Assistant.
Answer questions about the world truthfully.
Answer in plain text. Keep it simple and to the point.
When controlling Home Assistant always call the intent tools. Use HassTurnOn to lock and HassTurnOff to unlock a lock. When controlling a device, prefer passing just name and domain. When controlling an area, prefer passing just area name and domain.
When a user asks to turn on all devices of a specific type, ask user to specify an area, unless there is only one device of that type.
This device is not able to start timers.
An overview of the areas and the devices in this smart home:
- names: Thermostat
  domain: climate
  state: 'off'
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom
  attributes:
    current_temperature: '22'
- names: Motion Sensor
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'on'
  areas: Rooftop Terrace
  attributes:
    device_class: motion
- names: Motion Sensor Battery
  domain: binary_sensor
  state: 'off'
  areas: Rooftop Terrace
  attributes:
    device_class: battery
- names: Exhaust Fan
  domain: fan
  state: 'off'
  areas: Bathroom
- names: Main Light
  domain: light
  state: 'on'
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom
  attributes:
    brightness: '100'
- names: Lamp
  domain: light
  state: 'on'
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom
  attributes:
    brightness: '100'
- names: Bathroom Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Bathroom
- names: Outdoor Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Rooftop Terrace
- names: Tv
  domain: media_player
  state: playing
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom
  attributes:
    volume_level: 0.5
    device_class: tv
- names: Smart Speaker
  domain: media_player
  state: playing
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom
  attributes:
    volume_level: 0.5
    device_class: speaker
- names: Thermostat Temperature
  domain: sensor
  state: '22'
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: °C
    device_class: temperature
- names: Thermostat Humidity
  domain: sensor
  state: '45'
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: '%'
    device_class: humidity
- names: Motion Sensor Battery
  domain: sensor
  state: '90'
  areas: Rooftop Terrace
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: '%'
    device_class: battery
- names: Exhaust Fan Humidity
  domain: sensor
  state: '45'
  areas: Bathroom
  attributes:
    unit_of_measurement: '%'
    device_class: humidity
- names: Vacuum Cleaner
  domain: vacuum
  state: docked
  areas: Living Room/Kitchen/Bedroom


You are a helpful assistant with tool calling capabilities. When you receive a tool call response, use the output to format an answer to the orginal use question.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Given the following functions, please respond with a JSON for a function call with its proper arguments that best answers the given prompt.

Respond in the format {"name": function name, "parameters": dictionary of argument name and its value}. Do not use variables.

{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassTurnOn",
        "description": "Turns on/opens a device or entity",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "water",
                            "gas",
                            "awning",
                            "blind",
                            "curtain",
                            "damper",
                            "door",
                            "garage",
                            "gate",
                            "shade",
                            "shutter",
                            "window",
                            "outlet",
                            "switch",
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassTurnOff",
        "description": "Turns off/closes a device or entity",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "water",
                            "gas",
                            "awning",
                            "blind",
                            "curtain",
                            "damper",
                            "door",
                            "garage",
                            "gate",
                            "shade",
                            "shutter",
                            "window",
                            "outlet",
                            "switch",
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassLightSet",
        "description": "Sets the brightness or color of a light",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "color": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "temperature": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0
                },
                "brightness": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0,
                    "maximum": 100
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaUnpause",
        "description": "Resumes a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaPause",
        "description": "Pauses a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaNext",
        "description": "Skips a media player to the next item",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassMediaPrevious",
        "description": "Replays the previous item for a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassSetVolume",
        "description": "Sets the volume of a media player",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "media_player"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "volume_level": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0,
                    "maximum": 100
                }
            },
            "required": [
                "volume_level"
            ]
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassVacuumStart",
        "description": "Starts a vacuum",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassVacuumReturnToBase",
        "description": "Returns a vacuum to base",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}

Please turn on the outdoor light<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

None
